duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain vendor relationships and act as a business analyst for non-IT projects or organizational roles above an administrative level but below a management level.
Coordinate the organization, tracking & execution of a critical vendor management program.
Present and explain market research, proposals, reports, and findings to internal stakeholders & executives.
Analyze industry intelligence, pricing forecasts, & internal metrics to become a go-to expert in your program area.
Assist in business reviews & negotiations with external vendors.
Review and recommend or approve contracts and cost estimates.
Maintain internal tooling to ensure optimal performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in business management, economics, finance, accounting, or relevant field required.
